name: squirrelsoft-dev-tools
description: Curated collection of development tools, skills, and agents for Claude Code
author: Scott Beardsley

plugins.name: claude-builder
plugins.description: Meta-tool for building Claude Code plugins, skills, and agents

plugins.name: doc-fetcher
plugins.description: Fetches, caches, and versions documentation from web sources to provide accurate, version-specific context for AI coding agents

plugins.name: infinite-memory
plugins.description: Semantic memory system for Claude Code with persistent context retention through vector embeddings

plugins.name: agency
plugins.description: Comprehensive workflow automation toolkit for the complete software development lifecycle. Includes 51+ specialized agents, composable workflow commands, and intelligent orchestration for requirements gathering, planning, implementation, testing, and deployment.
